title: My Resume
aboutMeText: Software developer with back-end experience, specialized in Node.js and Spring Boot. Experienced in designing REST applications, microservices deployed with Kubernetes, and agile methodologies like Scrum. Motivated by solving problems, learning new technologies, and working in teams. Advanced English (B2).
availabilityText: Available for full-time work and freelance projects.
communicationDescription: Clear transmission of both technical and non-technical ideas.
problemSolvingDescription: Analysis and resolution of complex challenges.
agileMethodologiesDescription: Experience with Scrum and management using Jira.
webDeveloperExperience: Web application development with modern technologies (React, Node.js, MySQL).
springAppDesign: Design of a Spring application with REST services.
frontendLiferayBPM: Frontend (Liferay) for clients and BPM for processes.
microservicesDockerKubernetes: Training in microservices with Docker and Kubernetes.
ecoagrocorralProject: EcoAgroCorral Project: Platform for booking rural experiences.
